summary: Attempted to connect to Figma MCP to read homepage design but requires Figma plugin to be running first. Found existing homepage implementation in resources/views/livewire/home.blade.php with comprehensive sections. User needs to run Cursor MCP Plugin in Figma to establish connection before I can read designs directly from Figma.
current_status: Figma MCP server and socket configured. Homepage already implemented with hero, features, courses, testimonials, blog sections. Waiting for Figma plugin connection or can proceed with improving existing implementation based on available design assets.
